ExampleDefinition.Description:
This example demonstrates how to create a Histogram with Labels on columns in SciChart. This is achieved by combining the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastColumnRenderableSeries.html']FastColumnRenderableSeries[/url] with a custom modifier which creates [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.TextAnnotation.html']TextAnnotation[/url] and positions them over the individual columns.
Take a look at the source-code to see how we've achieved this.
